ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Pipeline Management Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Pipeline Management'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , $Profile.Name <> "OSS Support", NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', OR(
ISBLANK( NS_ExternalCaseNotes__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Case Resolution (External) prior to closing the Case.
